Articles.Content:
Hello everybody! I'm not exactly new to KSP. I've been playing it since April 28th and I've just now been getting back into it.

Anyways, a couple days ago, I finally achieved my (first?) milestone: Getting into orbit. I now have 3 ships in orbit, and I'm trying to get one to the Mun.

I started my account because you guys seem like a very friendly and helpful community, and I could really go for some advice on using my 3/4ths of fuel to get to the Mun. Don't worry, I'm not going for that much realism here; I plan on planting a flag and leaving my Kerbonauts there to start a base.

Tips and hints would really be helpful. Sorry for the long/off topic post. Thanks!
